title: screen turns green when i ping
body:
ok i been playing lol fine in a long time, all at max settings.. then suddenly i keep getting crashes and green screen after a windows update..the last crash killed my pc it wont boot and would jst restart over and over, so i did a clean reset, reinstalled everyting, drivers, etc..everything is up to date, but i still get a green screen each time a ping and sometimes my pc just restarts after i ping in game..also alt tabbing to browse while playing gives me green screen also, but i can still see the game and sounds.. i would have to alt tab back to game until the screen returns back to normal..before this shit happens i remember i left my pc to shutdown while it was updating windows. then all shit happens after that. 
i tried reinstaling to older drivers didnt work..uninstalled nvidia experience didnt work..reinstaled bios, drivers of anything i can think of still didnt fix.
ill post screenshot later.

anyway my pc spec are
windows 10 pro 64 bit
z170n-gaming 5 mobo
i7-6700 cpu @3.40ghz
16gb ram
zotac gtx 970  4gb amp omega core

replies.body: not a driver issue or a computer issue...... have the same problem and no other games have problems just yours.

A green screen is a really strange issue, and I'm thinking there may be some driver or game file problems causing the game to not render properly.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to both tune up your PC and refresh any files that may have become corrupt.  It would be best to update your drivers instead of rolling back to make sure it meets requirements for the game.  This should get you fixed up, but let me know!
